value.title: Publish and share in Power BI
value.excerpt: Publish and share your Power BI reports and dashboards to teammates in your organization or to everyone on the web.

value.title: Append and Merge Tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly merge and append tables using the query editior in Power BI. Build models with multiple data sources. Contact me on LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland

value.title: DAX Fridays! #1: How to write DAX measures....fast in Power BI
value.excerpt: DAX Fridays! #1: How to write DAX measures....fast in Power BI  In today's video I will show you how to write Power BI measures quickly and even how to format them. value.title: DAX Fridays! #25: Wrong Grand Totals in Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through why sometimes Power BI grand totals dont add up and what to do to fix it. value.title: DAX Fridays! #81: CALCULATETABLE
value.excerpt: In todays video we are going to cover the DAX function CALCULATETABLE.  CALCULATETABLE allows you to create virtual tables that you can then filter using multiple conditions and use that table to make further calculations.   What is the difference between CALCULATETABLE and CALCULATE?  The first one

value.title: How to do Pagination on a REST API in Power Query (Part 1)
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how to implement pagination when the number of pages or records to be returned are known.   Chapters: 00:00 Intro 00:30 Not all APIs have the same structure 01:10 Get data from World Bank API 01:45 How pagination works on the API 02:30 Hardcode the number of pages

value.title: List dates between two dates in Power Query
value.excerpt: Need to create a list of dates between a start date and end date? Well, let's look at how Imke did it in the Power BI community, it will blow your mind :) #curbal #powerquery #mlanguage #powerbi  Here is the thread on the Power BI community, where you can find Imke's code: https://community.powerbi.com/t5/Desktop/M-Power-Query-help-for-table-merge-Conditional-Cross-Join/m-p/478272#M222561

value.title: Conditional Formatting with Field Parameters in Power BI???

value.title: Create a date range parameter with Power BI Paginated Reports
value.excerpt: How do you do a date range with the Paginated visual used with Power BI Paginated Reports? Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual

value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Marco Russo, from SQL BI, joins Patrick to look at how you can debug DAX using variables in Power BI. value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at Power BI reports and buttons. Buttons were added to Power BI Desktop in the April 2018 release.
